import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { NgbActiveModal } from '@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap'; @Component({ selector: 'app-settle-up', templateUrl: './settle-up.component.html', styleUrls: ['./settle-up.component.css'] }) export class SettleUpComponent { constructor(public activeModal: NgbActiveModal){} @Input() payerId!: number; @Input() payerUsername!: string; @Input() recieverId!: number; @Input() recieverUsername!: string; @Input() amount!: number; @Input() currency!: string; @Input() currencies!: string[]; }

Settle up

{{ payerUsername }}{{ recieverUsername }}
Amount is required.
Currency is required.
